Title
====================================================

**W0113-24CS15 - B - Industrial Shredder**
------------------------------------------------

**Procurement Reference Number:** WS4149983232-Doc4330544369

**Solicitation Number:** WS4149983232

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** December 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Status:** Expiré

### Background

Canada is seeking Offers from eligible Parties to supply an Industrial Shredder System for Textile, Plastic, and Hard Drive Destruction to the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Scope of Work

The Offeror must provide an Industrial Shredder System that can effectively shred and destroy textile, plastic, and hard drive materials in line with predetermined specifications and safety standards.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price.

### Logistics

* **Deliveries:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contract Documents

* The complete Tender package is available on Ariba Discovery
* URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18318603?extsite=MTgzMTg2MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18318603?extsite=MTgzMTg2MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact

For any inquiries regarding the Tender, please contact Christopher Casale (SPAC/PSPC) at christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Disclaimer

By offering and supplying an Industrial Shredder System, the Offeror acknowledges the requirements outlined in the User Agreement and all applicable Canadian and Quebec Laws.
